content.text: If the first job fail - the next one will not run.
If any of them fails - the next steps (currently there are none, but it might change) will not run.
to false, check the result of the run, and if any of them fails - write a message on Slack and send an email.
Job should not fail for this stage fail
Send Slack message if any of then fail when trigger.

content.text: but we have lot of users which are already existed and which were created manually. We need to convert them also in terraform to manage them from terraform so that would help us to review the users and their permissions while migrating to cp-org account instead of login and checking from console.
All users should import into terraform statefile
Terraform plan should be up-to-date without making any resource changes on AWS
